imageEditor.title: Nano Banana Image Editor

imageEditor.batchDescription: Process multiple images simultaneously using batch mode
imageEditor.promptPlaceholder: Describe the changes you want to make. For example: 'Add a few passing cars on the road' or 'Change background to sunset'
imageEditor.tip1: Be specific about lighting, style, and composition
imageEditor.tip2: Use reference images for better character consistency
imageEditor.tip3: Describe what you want to change, not what to keep
imageEditor.tip4: Combine multiple edits in one prompt for best results
